name: Notion2Instagram
description: Publish posts to Instagram from Notion

NT_DB.description: Notion database id of the duplicated template

NT_TOKEN.description: in case you didn't share the Notion database to the web you need to add token_v2 (Click F12 to open dev console, In Application > Cookies > https://notion.so Copy the value of token_v2)

INTERVAL.description: Interval to check new posts on Notion in seconds
